pageSetting.title: 存贷款机构利润分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZBSDBS' and dmz in('5','6','7') order by dmz

col.title: 提前利息支出扣回(万元)
应收未收利息新增(万元)

select.isEqual: select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,dqye,rjye,ftplxsr,zbjsr,tqlxzchk,lxzc,mnlr,rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zbjsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as tqlxzchk, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from pas.khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join pas.yjzb_gjyj_jg yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz and yj.tjkj=gl.tjkj inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on yj.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and jg.jgdj='$jgdj$' inner join pas.csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq = cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (fn_getsjjg_java_qx(sj.ym, $login_khdxdh$, 0) ) qxjg on qxjg.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjkj='$tjkj$' and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1001 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc) z

select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,dqye,rjye,lxsr,ftplxzc,zcjzzb,yswslxxz,mnlr,rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zcjzzb, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as yswslxxz, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from pas.khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join pas.yjzb_gjyj_jg yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz and yj.tjkj=gl.tjkj inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on yj.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and jg.jgdj='$jgdj$' inner join pas.csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq = cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (fn_getsjjg_java_qx(sj.ym, $login_khdxdh$, 0) ) qxjg on qxjg.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjkj='$tjkj$' and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1002 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc) z

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,dqye,rjye,ftplxsr,zbjsr,tqlxzchk,lxzc,mnlr,rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zbjsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as tqlxzchk, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from pas.khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join pas.yjzb_gjyj_jg yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz and yj.tjkj=gl.tjkj inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on yj.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and jg.jgdj='$jgdj$' inner join pas.csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq = cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (fn_getsjjg_java_qx(sj.ym, $login_khdxdh$, 0) ) qxjg on qxjg.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjkj='$tjkj$' and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1001 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc) z
select tjny,jgdh,jgmc,dqye,rjye,lxsr,ftplxzc,zcjzzb,yswslxxz,mnlr,rank() over(order by mnlr desc) as pm from( select $tjny$ as tjny, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as dqye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as rjye, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as lxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as ftplxzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=5 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as zcjzzb, sum(case when gl.pxxh=6 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as yswslxxz, sum(case when gl.pxxh=7 then yj.zbz else 0 end)/cast(10000 as float) as mnlr from pas.khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join pas.yjzb_gjyj_jg yj on yj.zbdh= gl.zbdh and yj.bz=gl.bz and yj.tjkj=gl.tjkj inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on yj.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and jg.jgdj='$jgdj$' inner join pas.csb_sjw sj on sj.ym = yj.tjrq and sj.tjrq = cast(cast($tjny$ as char(6))||'01' as integer) inner join table (fn_getsjjg_java_qx(sj.ym, $login_khdxdh$, 0) ) qxjg on qxjg.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjkj='$tjkj$' and yj.sdbs=(case when gl.pxxh>=3 then '$sdbs$' when gl.pxxh = 2 then f_numtochar(cast('$sdbs$' as integer)-3) else '1' end ) and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1002 group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc) z ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZBSDBS' and dmz in('5','6','7') order by dmz
